Title: SSCC Membership
Description: SSCC Membership is the system used by Shepperton Slalom Canoe Club to manage it's users.  It uses SQL server to store data, ASP.net web services for data access and Silverlight for the client UI.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SSCC Membership is the system used by Shepperton Slalom Canoe Club to manage it's users. It uses SQL server to store data, ASP.net web services for data access and Silverlight for the client UI.
